item.createenderlink.scope_filter.toolti: Combine _player information_ with _an item_ to generate _a unique frequency_ and prevent _frequency collisions_ with other players.
createenderlink.ponder.ender_vault_shari: Sharing Items via the Ender Item Vault
The Ender Vault can share its contents like an Ender Chest
The Ender Vault has a slot for setting its frequency
Placing an item in the slot determines the frequency
Ender Vaults with the same frequency share their contents
When wearing Engineers' Goggles, the player can see how many Ender Vaults are currently linked
createenderlink.ponder.ender_vault_contr: Using Ender Item Vaults in Contraptions
Ender Vaults can be integrated into contraptions
Vaults in a contraption also share contents with other vaults on the same frequency
createenderlink.ponder.ender_tank_sharin: Sharing Fluids via the Ender Fluid Tank
The Ender Fluid Tank can share its fluid contents
The Ender Fluid Tank has a slot for setting its frequency
Placing an item in the slot sets the frequency
Ender Fluid Tanks with the same frequency share their contents
When wearing Engineers' Goggles, the player can see how many Ender Fluid Tanks are currently linked
createenderlink.storage_frequency.craft_: Place in crafting grid to reset
